particleengine

Class BaseIEmitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • particleengine.IEmitter
      • particleengine.BaseIEmitter

  • public abstract class BaseIEmitter
extends IEmitter
    Partial implementation of IEmitter that omits only the particle generation function. All other properties are set to default values and may be overwritten as required.

        Specified by:
        getSprite in class IEmitter
        Returns:
        Sprite that particles from this emitter will have. Can be null, in which a default particle will be used.

      • getXDir

        public float getXDir()
        Specified by:
        getXDir in class IEmitter
        Returns:
        Angle, in degrees, that this emitter's x-axis faces. If 0, then this emitter's axes coincides with global axes (x-axis facing to the right).

      • getRenderRadius

        public float getRenderRadius()
        Specified by:
        getRenderRadius in class IEmitter
        Returns:
        Distance from edge of screen beyond which particles are culled before generation. This applies to the emitter's location rather than individual particles' locations.
